Basic Sword.Description: This is a basic training sword. Dont worry you will get use to it

Basic Bow.Description: This is a basic training Bow. We dont have auto aim so good luck

Health Potion.Description: Well it a health potion. You drink it to heal health

Tea Leaf.Description: A leaf that can be used for crafting, not sure when that func ready but who know right

Bomb.Description: This bomb is prototype, but it still can do damage. Be careful not to get to close when it explode, you can still get hurt
